author: Joyce Dias
text: I am looking for any policy's that address E-cigarettes. I am interested in both allowing or banning them. If you have any first hand knowledge I would also be interested in what you think about them. If you have a policy please email me at: diasj@pbfl.org, Thank you! Joyce Dias, 321-952-3421.
title: Electronic Cigarettes
